apps.dependencyInstallCommand: unset NPM_TOKEN npm_config__auth npm_config__authToken npm_config_auth npm_config_email npm_config_username; printf "registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/\nalways-auth=false\n" > .npmrc && printf "" > .npmrc-global && export NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG=$(pwd)/.npmrc NPM_CONFIG_GLOBALCONFIG=$(pwd)/.npmrc-global npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ npm_config_always_auth=false npm_config_legacy_peer_deps=true && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ --loglevel=verbose
